data.blankContent: Signal processing is employed in radar systems to reduce the radar interference effects. Signal ____ techniques ____ moving ____ indication, Pulse-Doppler ____ processing, moving ____ detection ____, ____ with ____ surveillance ____ targets, space-time ____ processing, and track-before-detect. Constant false alarm rate and digital terrain model processing are also used in clutter environments.
data.partBlankContent: Signal processing is employed in radar systems to reduce the radar interference effects. Signal proce_____ techniques inc____ moving tar___ indication, Pulse-Doppler sig___ processing, moving tar___ detection proce_____, corre______ with seco_____ surveillance ra___ targets, space-time adap____ processing, and track-before-detect. Constant false alarm rate and digital terrain model processing are also used in clutter environments.
data.answer: 雷达系统采用信号处理技术来降低雷达干扰的影响。信号处理技术包括运动目标指示、脉冲多普勒信号处理、运动目标检测处理器、与二次监视雷达目标的相关性、空时自适应处理和探测前跟踪。在杂波环境下，还采用了恒虚警率和数字地形模型处理方法。
